item.description:
2010 Wolfe Biopharma Conference” Emerging Markets and Technologies 2010 Vision

When: Tuesday, October 19th

Where: The Ritz-Carlton

Boston Common

Boston, MA

Website: www.wolfelabs.com

The 2010 Wolfe Biopharma Conference, Emerging Markets and Technologies: 2020 VisionTM, is an exclusive, invitation-only event for pharmaceutical and biotechnology executives and investors. The pharmaceutical industry is undergoing rapid transformation, necessitating redeployment of their resources, strategies and organizations toward emerging markets and technologies. Healthcare policy reform, the global economic crisis, and large pharmas’ imminent

patent cliff have converged while unique opportunities in emerging markets and technological innovations seem to appear with increasing frequency. At the 2010 Wolfe Biopharma Conference, industry leaders will address these challenges and opportunities.
item.name: 2010 Wolfe Biopharma Conference” Emerging Markets and Technologies 2010 Vision
